1) Levantar ambiente:  npx hardhat node
2) Deploy no contrato:  npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/HotelRoom.ts --network localhost
3) Executar Script de Teste: npx hardhat run executeJs/HotelRoom_Reserve.js --network localhost
4) Executar Script de Teste: npx hardhat run executeJs/HotelRoom_AddCosts.js --network localhost
5) Executar Script de Teste: npx hardhat run executeJs/HotelRoom_Release.js --network localhost
